attributes.action: Christians are being targeted for their religious belief's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Christians around the world are being targeted over their religious views.

Especially under Sharia law. The world must take action over this. Otherwise it will be another case of nazism over the Jews now the christians.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
